Welcome to The Good Egg

Hard Boiled Eggs

Perfect hard boiled eggs require the right touch. We cooked dozens and dozens of eggs to perfect our technique. This dish delivers eggs that are evenly cooked throughout, with just-set yolks.

Poached Eggs

Looking for the most amazing and delicious poached eggs? This simple dish consists of perfectly firm egg whites and oozy, golden egg yolks.

Quiche

Sweet caramelised leeks, piquant artichokes and creamy goat's cheese unite in this irresistible quiche, for when you need a simple yet satisfying lunch.

Scrambled Eggs

This scrambled egg recipe took a bit of tweaking, but we’ve finally made the best scrambled eggs ever! Our customers love it.
